fields.summary: Android: Creating Project without android-4 platform causes grey screen for emulator

comments.body:
{html}

(from [90dcc576a15bae27dc900bbf59cf6e144e8d7744]) don't create the project structure for android if we can't succesfully find the SDK, report an error message back so developer doesn't have a half-created project. [#840 state:resolved] http://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/commit/90dcc576a15ba...
